title: China Sophisticated Harbin City Break with Indoor Pool
description: Offering a contemporary stay in Harbin - the largest city in China's Heilongjiang province - the towering Crowne Plaza Harbin Songbei, an IHG Hotel is a lofty refuge with convenient access to this heritage city. Dine on sumptuous cuisine at Garden View Plaza Chinese Restaurant or Crowne Cafe. Then, energise body and mind at the fitness centre and indoor pool, sip a sophisticated cocktail at the Lobby Lounge or head out to explore the myriad of attractions in this bustling city.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Harbin Songbei, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 233 Feng Yuan Street Songbei District Heilongjiang Province, Harbin 150028, Mainland China

title: China French-Inspired City Glamour in Harbin with Three Restaurants, Pool & Spa
description:
Soak up the charms of China's Ice City from this sophisticated urban retreat in Harbin's lively Xiangfang District, where French art de vivre meets modern luxury. Diverse dining takes centre stage here, with global flavours at Elements, refined Japanese teppanyaki at ii and authentic regional cuisine at the Chinese Restaurant.

After a day of discovering Harbin’s famed Ice and Snow World, Sun Island or the onion-domed Saint Sophia Cathedral, unwind in the heated indoor pool or rejuvenate at Lea Spa. Stylish and serene, this is your perfect base for uncovering the magic of northern China’s winter wonderland.
offer_address: 68 Ganshui Road Xiangfang District, Harbin, Heilongjiang 150090, China
